attributes.action: continue to protect Stonehenge as a World Heritage Site and give this ancient monument the proper respect it deserves for future generations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The MP for Salisbury, Mr Keys, wants Stonehenge to be declassified as a World Heritage Site.  Stonehenge is an ancient monument and should be given the proper care and respect that it deserves.  It is part of our culture and heritage and should be preserved for future generations
